defineservice.name: metratech.com/TieredEventRatesPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring TieredEventRates Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of number of events covered by the tiered event rates decision.
Tier end for the range of number of events covered by the tiered event rates decision.
Override rate for the number of events that fall within the StartOfEventCountRange to EndOfEventCountRange number of events.
